title: NOVA
description: An AI-powered personal assistant with voice control, app management, system controls, Google Calendar integration, image analysis, real-time translation, chatbot, search capabilities, music control, and productivity automation. Experience hands-free digital interaction with natural language understanding and personalized assistance.
features: Voice-controlled interface with natural language processing
Smart calendar management with Google Calendar integration
System controls for automation and productivity
summary: NOVA is a full-featured AI assistant offering voice control, productivity automation, smart calendar management, real-time translation, and image analysis.
shortSummary: AI assistant with voice control, calendar, translation, and productivity features.

title: Outfit-AI Mobile
description: A React Native mobile app version of Outfit-AI, featuring weather-based outfit recommendations, AI-powered fashion advice, digital wardrobe management, and shopping integration. The app provides a seamless mobile experience with offline capabilities and push notifications.
features: Offline access to saved outfits and wardrobe
summary: Outfit-AI Mobile provides weather-based outfit recommendations, AI fashion advice, wardrobe management, and shopping features on mobile.
shortSummary: Mobile fashion AI app with outfit suggestions and wardrobe management.

title: Outfit-AI
description: A comprehensive fashion AI platform featuring weather-based outfit recommendations, AI-powered chatbot for fashion advice, digital wardrobe management, shopping integration with Amazon and Myntra, and image classification using Gemini AI. The platform includes features like outfit planning, social sharing, and a mobile-responsive design.
features: Weather-based outfit recommendations using real-time data
Digital wardrobe management with image classification
Shopping integration with Amazon and Myntra
summary: Outfit-AI is a full-featured fashion platform offering outfit recommendations, chatbot advice, wardrobe management, and shopping integration.
shortSummary: Fashion AI platform with outfit planning, chatbot, and shopping features.

title: Medpulse
description: A web application that allows users to book doctor appointments and find the nearest clinic using geolocation, rate doctors, get prescriptions via email and chat with doctors.
summary: Medpulse is a healthcare web app for booking appointments, finding clinics, messaging doctors, and managing prescriptions.
shortSummary: Healthcare app for appointments, prescriptions, and doctor communication.

title: Friendify
description: A full-stack social media application where users can sign up, post updates, add friends, share posts within their network, real-time messaging, story sharing, and media sharing.
features: Real-time news feed with posts and stories
summary: Friendify is a social media platform with posts, stories, real-time messaging, and media sharing.
shortSummary: Social media app with messaging, posts, and media sharing.

title: WhisperLog
description: A real-time chat web app with text and media sharing. Uniquely optimized backend uses a 10-message buffer and 60-second intervals for efficient message handling. Features include optimistic message rendering, voice-to-text, auto-correction via API, user profiles, and end-to-end encryption with X25519.
summary: WhisperLog is a secure real-time chat app with end-to-end encryption, voice-to-text, and media sharing.
shortSummary: Encrypted chat app with media and voice-to-text.

title: Dhaango
description: A scalable web application aimed at improving farmer productivity by enabling real-time communication, providing access to essential tools and updates on schemes.
summary: Dhaango is a platform for farmers to get updates, communicate, track crop prices, and access government schemes.
shortSummary: Farmer productivity app with updates and alerts.

title: Decentralized Cyber Defense
summary: Decentralized Cyber Defense is a cybersecurity platform leveraging blockchain, IPFS, and ML for distributed protection.
shortSummary: Cybersecurity platform with blockchain, IPFS, and ML.
